duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct wet chemistry and analytical instrumentation for large molecule (protein) therapeutics.
Perform electrophoresis, buffer preparation, pH, UV, and colorimetric assays.
Analyze raw materials, intermediate batches, packaging, and finished products.
Troubleshoot and investigate out of specification results.
Perform analytical testing on all incoming raw materials and annual full testing using specified methodology.
Disposition of raw materials, intermediates, batches, and finished products.
Data entry of test results and investigation of out of specification results.
Support method and/or product transfer and NPI activity.
Preparation, documentation, and maintenance of test solutions and standards.
Maintain, calibrate, and validate laboratory equipment.
Ensure GMP, Quality, Health, and Safety are considered in all aspects of the role.
Perform other duties as directed by QC Specialist or QC manager.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Chemistry or a related field (Master's preferred)
